User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile image.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

followersCount.description: The number of followers the user has.

followingCount.description: The number of users this user is following.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a post created by a user.

fileUrl.description: Link to the file in Firebase Storage.

thumbnail.description: Optional thumbnail for video or photo posts.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the post.

likes.description: The number of likes the post has received.

commentsCount.description: The number of comments on the post.

duration.description: Duration in seconds for music or video posts.

tags.description: Hashtags or categories for the post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the post was created.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores all posts created by users.

params.name: postId
params.description: The unique identifier for the post.
